text: Kenneth M. Duberstein (April 21, 1944 - March 2, 2022) was an American politician and lobbyist. He served as U.S. President Ronald Reagan's White House Chief of Staff from 1988 to 1989. Duberstein died at a hospital in Washington, D.C. on March 2, 2022 at the age of 77. == References == == Other websites == Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American lobbyists Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Politicians from Brooklyn Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:White House Chiefs of Staff
title: Kenneth Duberstein
